verses.verse: A Psalm of David <WH1732>. The YY <WH3068> is my light <WH216> and my salvation <WH3468>; whom shall I fear <WH3372> <WH8799>? the YY <WH3068> is the strength <WH4581> of my life <WH2416>; of whom shall I be afraid <WH6342> <WH8799> ?

When the wicked <WH7489> <WH8688>, even mine enemies <WH6862> and my foes <WH341> <WH8802>, came <WH7126> <WH8800> upon me to eat up <WH398> <WH8800> my flesh <WH1320>, they stumbled <WH3782> <WH8804> and fell <WH5307> <WH8804>.

Though an host <WH4264> should encamp <WH2583> <WH8799> against me, my heart <WH3820> shall not fear <WH3372> <WH8799>: though war <WH4421> should rise <WH6965> <WH8799> against me, in this will I be confident <WH982> <WH8802>.

One <WH259> thing have I desired <WH7592> <WH8804> of the YY <WH3068>, that will I seek <WH1245> <WH8762> after; that I may dwell <WH3427> <WH8800> in the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068> all the days <WH3117> of my life <WH2416>, to behold <WH2372> <WH8800> the beauty <WH5278> of the YY <WH3068>, and to enquire <WH1239> <WH8763> in his temple <WH1964>.

For in the time <WH3117> of trouble <WH7451> he shall hide <WH6845> <WH8799> me in his pavilion <WH5520>: in the secret <WH5643> of his tabernacle <WH168> shall he hide <WH5641> <WH8686> me; he shall set me up <WH7311> <WH8787> upon a rock <WH6697>.

And now shall mine head <WH7218> be lifted up <WH7311> <WH8799> above mine enemies <WH341> <WH8802> round about <WH5439> me: therefore will I offer <WH2076> <WH8799> in his tabernacle <WH168> sacrifices <WH2077> of joy <WH8643>; I will sing <WH7891> <WH8799>, yea, I will sing praises <WH2167> <WH8762> unto the YY <WH3068>.
Hear <WH8085> <WH8798>, O YY <WH3068>, when I cry <WH7121> <WH8799> with my voice <WH6963>: have mercy <WH2603> <WH8798> also upon me, and answer <WH6030> <WH8798> me.
When thou saidst, Seek <WH1245> <WH8761> ye my face <WH6440>; my heart <WH3820> said <WH559> <WH8804> unto thee, Thy face <WH6440>, YY <WH3068>, will I seek <WH1245> <WH8762>.

Hide <WH5641> <WH8686> not thy face <WH6440> far from me; put <WH5186> not thy servant <WH5650> away <WH5186> <WH8686> in anger <WH639>: thou hast been my help <WH5833>; leave <WH5203> <WH8799> me not, neither forsake <WH5800> <WH8799> me, O 'Elohim <WH430> of my salvation <WH3468>.
When my father <WH1> and my mother <WH517> forsake <WH5800> <WH8804> me, then the YY <WH3068> will take me up <WH622> <WH8799>.
Teach <WH3384> <WH8685> me thy way <WH1870>, O YY <WH3068>, and lead <WH5148> <WH8798> me in a plain <WH4334> path <WH734>, because of mine enemies <WH8324> <WH8802>.

Deliver <WH5414> <WH8799> me not over unto the will <WH5315> of mine enemies <WH6862>: for false <WH8267> witnesses <WH5707> are risen up <WH6965> <WH8804> against me, and such as breathe out <WH3307> cruelty <WH2555>.
I had fainted, unless <WH3884> I had believed <WH539> <WH8689> to see <WH7200> <WH8800> the goodness <WH2898> of the YY <WH3068> in the land <WH776> of the living <WH2416>.
Wait <WH6960> <WH8761> on the YY <WH3068>: be of good courage <WH2388> <WH8798>, and he shall strengthen <WH553> <WH8686> thine heart <WH3820>: wait <WH6960> <WH8761>, I say, on the YY <WH3068>.
